columns.id: A unique identifier for each airport in the database.
columns.City: The name of the city where the airport is located.
columns.Country: The name of the country where the airport operates.
columns.IATA: The three-letter International Air Transport Association code that uniquely identifies the airport.
columns.ICAO: The four-letter International Civil Aviation Organization code used for airport identification.
columns.name: The full name of the airport, typically including the city or region.

airport.table_description: The airport table contains information about various airports, including their identification codes, locations, and full names.

columns.id: A unique identifier for each operating company in the database.
columns.name: The official name of the operating company.
columns.Type: The category that classifies the operational structure of the company, such as subsidiary or joint venture.
columns.Principal_activities: The main business operations performed by the company.
columns.Incorporated_in: The country where the company is legally incorporated.
columns.Group_Equity_Shareholding: The percentage of equity ownership held by the parent group or holding company.

operate_company.table_description: The operate_company table contains detailed information about various operating companies, including their names, classification types, main activities, incorporation locations, and equity shareholding percentages.

columns.id: A unique identifier for each flight record in the database.
columns.Vehicle_Flight_number: A designated alphanumeric code representing a specific flight.
columns.Date: The date on which the flight took place.
columns.Pilot: The name of the pilot who operated the flight.
columns.Velocity: The speed at which the aircraft was traveling during the flight.
columns.Altitude: The height above sea level at which the flight was conducted.
columns.airport_id: An identifier linking to the airport from which the flight departed.
columns.company_id: An identifier linking to the airline company operating the flight.

flight.table_description: The flight table contains detailed information about various flights, including identifiers, flight details, pilot information, and relationships to specific airlines and airports.
